This nonsense is produced by Pete Brown.

I grew up in a tiny village six miles outside Norwich.

My dad was born and raised in Wirral. He took me to the 1990 Leyland Daf Cup Final.

![1990 Leyland Daf Cup Final, Wembley Stadium.](IMG_5539.JPG "Pete at Wembley for the 1990 Leyland Daf Cup Final."){fig-alt="Pete at Wembley for the 1990 Leyland Daf Cup Final." width=80%}

I haven't been able to get to a live game since a dismal 0-0 draw away at Braintree Town in August, 2015.
